summary: A website that links and displays the newest whitewater kayak designs
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dynamic whitewater rapids hero background with flowing water and spray (hero-rapids.dim_1920x600.png)
- Stylized whitewater kayak icon logo with paddle (kayak-logo.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Build a frontend gallery view that displays all kayak designs as cards showing the kayak image, name, manufacturer, year, and a clickable link to view more details
Create an admin form to add new kayak designs with input fields for name, manufacturer, year, image URL, and external link URL

Design a cohesive visual theme inspired by whitewater kayaking with dynamic water-themed colors (teals, aqua, deep blues, whites), energetic typography, and flowing layouts that evoke movement and adventure
Render generated kayak-themed hero background and kayak icon logo from static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Display links to newest whitewater kayak designs
Create a backend data model to store whitewater kayak designs with fields for kayak name, manufacturer, design year, image URL, and external link URL
Implement backend methods to add new kayak designs and retrieve all kayak designs sorted by design year (newest first)
